body: Moreen's notes from a demonstration organised by Kenyans supporting The International Criminal Court: "Chantingand weaving their way round Freedom Corner carrying placards and wearing t-shirts with slogans like ‘Yes to the ICC’ ‘Defending Suspects Not with my Money’ ‘Yes to the ICC! No to Impunity!’"

title: Kenya: Notes from the ICC demonstration
